Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.mermaid

Class OpenMetadataRootMermaidGraphBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.mermaid.MermaidGraphBuilderBase
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.mermaid.OpenMetadataRootMermaidGraphBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActorProfileMermaidGraphBuilder, ActorRoleMermaidGraphBuilder, ExternalIdMermaidGraphBuilder, OpenMetadataRootHierarchyMermaidGraphBuilder
public class OpenMetadataRootMermaidGraphBuilder extends MermaidGraphBuilderBase
Creates a mermaid graph rendering of the Open Metadata Framework's attributed metadata element.
